findings.rationale: The confidentiality obligation lasts for five years, which may be insufficient for certain sensitive information that requires longer protection.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect for a period of five (5) years from the date of execution.

findings.rationale: The ability to seek injunctive relief without posting a bond increases the risk of potential misuse or overreach in enforcement actions.
findings.evidence_quote: the Disclosing Party shall be entitled to seek injunctive relief without posting bond or other security.

findings.rationale: Restricting assignment without consent may lead to operational difficulties if one party needs to transfer rights or obligations due to business changes.
findings.evidence_quote: Neither party may assign this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other party
